title: Elections within 90 days: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 03 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib said on Sunday that new elections would be held within 90 days.
The minister said this in a post on his twitter handle.
New elections will be held in 90 days
â€” Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) April 3, 2022
